text.section: Each county and the City of Takoma Park are responsible for the maintenance of stormwater management systems or parts of the systems located within its stormwater management district and transferred to it under this title.

The Commission and any municipality in Montgomery County or Prince George's County shall allow the county to enter and exit over any of the fees, leaseholds, easements, or rights-of-way of the Commission or the municipality to maintain any stormwater management easement, structure, or other property.
